title: Viana de Freitas (Manuel Luís)
body: He was born in Funchal on May 28, 1820, and died here on May 29, 1861. He was the gatekeeper of the Civil Government and a corresponding member of the Dramatic Institute of Coimbra. He collaborated in some newspapers in Funchal and wrote a drama entitled D. Luiz d'Athayde.

Manuel Luís Viana de Freitas: Birth and death, gatekeeper of the Civil Government, corresponding member of the Dramatic Institute of Coimbra, collaborator in newspapers in Funchal, author of the drama D. Luiz d'Athayde
